items.title: All Steps | File System Connector Documentation
items.description: List of all steps for File System Connector. Sequence connector for interacting with file systems of various OSes. Includes steps to interact with files, directories, paths, and compression.

items.title: DeleteItem Step | File System Connector Documentation
items.description: Deletes a file or folder from the file system.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: DirectoryCopy Step | File System Connector Documentation
items.description: Copy a directory. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: DirectoryCreate Step | File System Connector Documentation
items.description: Creates a new directory in the file system. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: DirectoryExists Step | File System Connector Documentation
items.description: Returns whether a directory on the file system exists.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: DirectoryGetItems Step | File System Connector Documentation
items.description: Gets all items in a directory. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: DirectoryMove Step | File System Connector Documentation
items.description: Move a directory. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: FileCopy Step | File System Connector Documentation
items.description: Copy a file. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: FileExists Step | File System Connector Documentation
items.description: Returns whether a file on the file system exists.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: FileExtract Step | File System Connector Documentation
items.description: Extract a file in the file system.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: FileMove Step | File System Connector Documentation
items.description: Move a file. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: FileRead Step | File System Connector Documentation
items.description: Reads text from a file.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: FileWrite Step | File System Connector Documentation
items.description: Writes a file to the local file system.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.

items.title: PathCombine Step | File System Connector Documentation
items.description: Combine Paths. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Sequence.
